L

leftClick(int, int) - Method in class Controller.Controller
Method called by window after a leftclick of the mouse that invokes the concrete leftClick method in a State the detailed implementation may largely differ in distinct states depending on the functionalities
leftClick(Controller, Window, int, int) - Method in class Controller.AddRequestState1
the detailed implementation of the method leftClick for the AddRequestState1 that selects the start address for the new request
leftClick(Controller, Window, int, int) - Method in class Controller.AddRequestState2
the detailed implementation of the method leftClick for the AddRequestState2 that selects the pickup address for the new request
leftClick(Controller, Window, int, int) - Method in class Controller.AddRequestState3
the detailed implementation of the method leftClick for the AddRequestState3 that selects the delivery address for the new request
leftClick(Controller, Window, int, int) - Method in class Controller.AddRequestState4
the detailed implementation of the method leftClick for the AddRequestState4 that selects the ending address for the new request
leftClick(Controller, Window, int, int) - Method in class Controller.DeleteRequestState
the detailed implementation of the method leftClick for the DeleteRequestState that selects the request to be deleted
leftClick(Controller, Window, int, int) - Method in interface Controller.State
the detailed leftClick method should be differently implemented in different states

loadMap() - Method in class Controller.Controller
Method called by window after a click on the button "Load a new map" that invokes the concrete loadMap method in a State
loadMap(Controller, Window) - Method in interface Controller.State
since the load map operation is the most global operation in all states, here we define the detailed method in the interface to reduce code replication
loadRequests() - Method in class Controller.Controller
Method called by window after a click on the button "Load requests" that invokes the concrete loadRequests method in a State
loadRequests(Controller, Window) - Method in class Controller.InitialState
since only the load map and the load request operation are the two most global operation in all states, whereas the load request must be in a condition where the map is loaded, here we override the load request operation to an empty one to reduce code replication
loadRequests(Controller, Window) - Method in interface Controller.State
since only the load map and the load request operation are the two most global operation in all states, whereas the load request must be in a condition where the map is loaded, here we define the load request method in the interface to reduce code replication
